title: Zoe Osama on Being from East Coast Crips, “Underrated” Blowing Up, Losing His Child & More
description:
Zoe Osama candidly shares about his life, fatherhood, the streets, doing time, turning his life around and more! https://www.instagram.com/zoeosama/


----
00:00 - Intro
5:03 - G*ngbanging in the music making things limited for the artist that do it
8:51 - Black people not being united
11:50 - Losing a child and homies, making him think about life in a different way
17:03 - His pops kicking him out after finding a bunch of cash in his pants but stealing 1K from it before giving it back to him
20:30 - Remembering using food stamps at the ice cream truck
21:50 - Performing at the Roxy with Seddy Hendrinx, GI Joe, Haiti babii
27:01 - G*ngbanging being trash, young ones being obsessed with d**th
30:11 - Losing his kid to natural causes while being in bail, passed out when his dad told him
34:01 - His sons passing being sudden, him going to the doctors the day before and being sent home
38:24 - Adam hitting him up one day early in the morning about his song being amazing, wanting to help him, Vell putting Adam on
41:00 - Being down for signing to No Jumper, taking up for Adam against culture vulture claims, “Don’t blame Adam!”
47:10 - Not knowing Adam did p*rn, possibly being willing to wife a OF girl
50:00 - Politics, Nina Boy, Spider Loc beef?
54:57 - People from LA know to not go to the Roscoes PnB Rock went to, Roscoes not even worth it
1:03:19 - Songs with Big Sad, Money sign suede, new tape coming “Big Deal”
1:06:02 - Don’t scare the labels away being too “g*ngsta"


---
